subject: delivery adress change
description_text:
Hello, i accidentaly put my old adress into the order.
Can you please change it to: 

Lidická tř.50, České Budějovice 370 01

Order: #SSN1742




Let me please know, if you were able to change it. Thank you.

Jan Prokeš

conversations.body_text: Hi Jan. prokes2,  Your address has been successfully updated — please don’t worry.
